verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee: make <S%H2363>haste<s%> unto me; give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee.

Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be set <S%H3559>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee as <S%H7004>incense<s%>; and the lifting <S%H4864>up<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> as the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice<s%>. set: Heb. directed
<S%H7896>Set<s%> a <S%H8108>watch<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, before my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.

<S%H5186>Incline<s%> not my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to any <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>, to <S%H5953>practise<s%> <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H5949>works<s%> with <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>: and let me not <S%H3898>eat<s%> of their <S%H4516>dainties<s%>.

Let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1986>smite<s%> me; it shall be a <S%H2617>kindness<s%>: and let him <S%H3198>reprove<s%> me; it shall be an <S%H7218>excellent<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, which shall not <S%H5106>break<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>: for yet my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> also shall be in their <S%H7451>calamities<s%>. me; it shall be a: or, let the rigteous smite mee kindly, and reprove me; let not their precious oil break my head, etc
When their <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H8058>overthrown<s%> in <S%H5553>stony<s%> <S%H3027>places<s%>, they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H561>words<s%>; for they are <S%H5276>sweet<s%>.
Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6340>scattered<s%> at the <S%H7585>grave's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, as when one <S%H6398>cutteth<s%> and <S%H1234>cleaveth<s%> wood upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

But mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are unto thee, O <S%H3069>GOD<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: in thee is my <S%H2620>trust<s%>; <S%H6168>leave<s%> not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6168>destitute<s%>. leave: Heb. make not my soul bare
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me from the <S%H3027>snares<s%> <S%H6341><s%> which they have <S%H3369>laid<s%> for me, and the <S%H4170>gins<s%> of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> into their own <S%H4364>nets<s%>, whilst that I <S%H3162>withal<s%> <S%H5674>escape<s%>. escape: Heb. pass over
